entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Upgrading Azure Function v4 from net6 to net7 System.Threading version 7 throws FileNotFoundException #92542
  • Add IsUnreferencedCodeAvailable feature switch #92541
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Invalid smnegl transformation #92537
    9.0.0
  • Standalone GC, GC_IsCompatibleWithRuntime(), building a standalone GC for multiple runtime versions #92536
  • Array of multidimensional arrays has wrong name #92535
  • 8.0 Performance regression #92530
  • [API Proposal]: Add source-generator for enum type #92529
  • Sometimes `testhost/CoreRun` crashes with `System.Diagnostics.Tracing`-related assertion failure #92519
  • System.Management.Tests fail with System.Management.ManagementException #92518

Closed

  • Exception unwinding broken with Xcode 15 linker #92297
  • [tvos] System.Runtime.Loader.Test.AssemblyNotSupported could not be loaded #92522
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'targetReg != op2Reg' during 'Generate code' #91209
    8.0.0
  • Random Constructors with `seed` parameter is wrong naming convention, it should be `Seed` -> `seed` parameter name #92517
  • Generic method static virtuals with default implementation behaves fails to compile #89101
    9.0.0
  • Incorrect value after truncating cast #92349
    8.0.0
  • [RyuJIT][LSRA] Take register encoding sizes into account #7996
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Make CoreCLR/NativeAOT assembly compile with .subsections_via_symbols on Apple platforms #92544
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Convert tests under GC subtree to the merged test model #92543
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • JIT: Register field seqs for GC pointer constants in side table #92540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use invariant culture for CBOR #92539
    area-System.Formats.Cbor, community-contribution
  • Implement InitialCapacity on CborWriter. #92538
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Formats.Cbor
  • Improve and unify debug views of dictionaries. #92534
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Fix doc comment #92531
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • [mono][ios] Enable fullAOT mode for runtime tests #92523
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Make `TypeDescriptor` thread safe with custom providers #92521
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Add 5 min timeout to VSIX update checks and validate installation state #92516
    area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc2' => 'release/8.0' #92515
    needs-area-label
  • Improve nullability check for generic `.ctor` parameters #92514
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] JIT: Fixed containment of STOREIND of HW intrinsics ConvertTo* #92513
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Make CoreCLR/NativeAOT assembly compile with .subsections_via_symbols on Apple platforms #92520
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use snprintf in pal_icushim.c #92452
    area-System.Globalization, 9.0.0
  • Convert a few reflection FCalls to C# #92512
    area-System.Reflection
  • Fix tvOS builds. #92525
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix asserts about arm64 hardware intrinsic register selection #92505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rename get_* to Get* in NativeAOT runtime #92498
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove blocking on a test for native AOT #91781
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete FEATURE_MANAGED_ETW_* defines for unmanaged code #92493
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-rc2] `IDispatch` should accept `HRESULT` as valuetype #92494
    Servicing-approved, area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Fixed containment of STOREIND of HW intrinsics ConvertTo* #92396
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [mono] Generate gsharedvt versions of the callvirt delegate invoke wr… #92472
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Extend preinitialization interpreter #92470
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][infra] Use llvm toolchain instead of binutils on linux #92057
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Fix #91958: use `mach_timebase_info` to determine process time coefficient on macOS #92185
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Reduce allocations in `BinaryReader`. #80331
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Optimize capturing lambdas in `DependencyContextExtensions` and `DependencyContextJsonReader` #92462
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution
  • [browser] dispose runtime #92480
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Support SIMD sizes for remainders in store decomposition #92469
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoiding trying to load the native library Microsoft.DiaSymReader.Native.<arch>.dll on Linux #92492
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE][wasm] wasm symbols #91241
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Memory mapped stresslog for NativeAOT #92506
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-23
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • Make 'dotnet tool restore' Automatic #4241
  • Add `dotnet tool update --all` option #10130
    Backlog
  • error CS0579: Duplicate 'global::System.Runtime.Versioning.TargetFrameworkAttribute' attribute #12297

PullRequests

Created

  • IDE0090 "'new' expression can be simplified" cleanup #35681
    untriaged
  • IDE0049 "Name can be simplified" cleanup #35680
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2274958 #35586
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Meaningful error on runtime identifier mismatch in project.assets.json #35491
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • IDE0200 "Lambda expression can be removed" cleanup #35678
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0028 (Collection initialization can be simplified) results in invalid results with Span targets #70101
  • IDE0028 (Collection initialization can be simplified) with CollectionBuilder methods results in recursive invocations #70099
  • csharp_space_around_binary_operators requires space before binary operator immediately proceeding an opening parentheses #70095
  • Making a virtual interface method abstract then implementing it results in MissingMethodException #70094
  • for loop snippet ignores var preference #70092

Closed

  • Autocompletion suggests keywords `and`/`or` after arrow of pointer member access in pattern matching #70045
    Backlog
  • [BUG] Naming of "Create and assign field" is inconsistent between mac and windows #69592
    September

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not offer to convert AsSpan on lvalues to collection expressions #70102
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use raw strings in regex tests #70098
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Don't recreate whole completion item upon calculation of properties. #70097
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fallback gracefully when running on runtimes that only support the Invariant culture #70096
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • More tests for an issue around constrained calls #70091
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Do not show `and` or `or` keywords after arrow of pointer access expression in patterns #70100
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Update recommender tests to use raw strings. #70093
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Revert "Merge pull request #69917 from CyrusNajmabadi/sgOOP2" #70065
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix official build check when publishing BCL in vsix #70081
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Workaround the deployment issue in Arcade #70090
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • EnC: simplify SymbolMatcher #70084
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Semantic snippets: Follow user's preferred modifier order for type declaration snippets #70079
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: fortunes #50898
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #50897
  • SVG mouse events not working on Visual Studio 17.8.0 Preview 2.0 (.NET 8) #50896
  • octet-streams in Blazor Server via long-polling are not compressed #50895
  • Еmbed the wwwroot directory and it's contents in order to create a single file executable when using Blazor in WPF #50894
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Blazor SSR StreamRendering re-renders last few elements. #50891
  • Perf improvement: caching #50889
  • Consistent naming standard for private static fields #50888
  • Make enhance navigation easy and predictable not harder. #50887

Closed

  • Perf regression: fortunes #50885
  • Perf regression: fortunes #50890
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #50886
  • Perf regression: plainTextSansFilter #50869
  • Perf improvement: updates #50884
  • BlazorWasm build benchmark broken #50821
    8.0

PullRequests

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2274892 #50824
    area-mvc
  • Replace ''return'' with lambda expression ''=>''. #50711
    area-identity, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Dotnet Maui Microsoft.Data.SqlClient Version="5.1.1" Android .Net 7 vs .Net 8 #17607
  • Circle SVG not rendering on iOS and Android #17606
  • MAUI Map: Please provide a way to disable zoom buttons but use pinch/expand gestures #17605
  • dotnet Publish error (MaterialDesignColor) #17600
  • Style Trigger Binding Not Recognizing Default Setter #17597

Closed

  • MAUI App template not showing in the filter even though we installed MAUI as per tutorial #16565
  • Resolve performance issues introduced by Setter Specificity PR #17520
    .NET 8 GA

PullRequests

Created

  • Recreate Details Fragment, if its been destroyed #17604
  • Fix some of the false GC test failures in Debug mode #17596
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17595
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • [net8.0] Bump net7 stable #17570
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • [controls] improve "setter specificity" performance #17527
    area/perf 🏎️, .NET 8 GA

Updated

  • Make ALL template warnings show up as errors (not just C# warnings), and produce more diagnostic artifacts #17586
    do-not-merge, area/templates 📄
  • Fix typo in build.sh #17305
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨, stale
  • fix using local asset files on windows #16930
    community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Bump the xunit group with 2 updates #17510
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Windows] Fixes border content clipping #17310
    .NET 8 GA

Merged

Updated

  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Support BigInteger, Int128 & UInt128 #31778
